name: Hell-Tech: 2808
description: Hell-Tech: 2808 is a fast paced action FPS inspired by the Doom Franchise. The player character is a janitor at Hell-Tech that has recently been given their harvesting notification signifying their “termination” from the company and their life. The company is preparing for a harvest of all low-level employees on the station and your player, defiant, refuses to lose his position at the company. Hell-Tech has decided to release their “subjects” to help herd all civilians to their “harvesting” zones and your player is determined to take down his former corporate overlords.
